articles.title: Pahalgam attack: Will India suspending Indus Waters Treaty affect Pakistan? - BBC
articles.description: After a deadly militant attack in Kashmir, India suspended a key water treaty with neighbouring Pakistan.
articles.content:
Navin Singh KhadkaEnvironment correspondent, BBC World Service
The Indus river flows through parts of India and Pakistan
Will India be able to stop the Indus river and two of its tributaries from f… [+6668 chars]
